00031 // Replace the expression from with the expression to in the SgNode parent, which
00032 //    must be from's parent. Function checks to ensure that it is used properly.
00033 // Note that if parent is an SgInitializedName, to must be SgInitializer in order 
00034 //    for the replacement to work properly.
00035 void replaceExpressionChecked(SgNode* parent, SgExpression* from, SgExpression* to);
